LanguageData.PortableCooler.label: light alloy cooler
LanguageData.PortableCooler.description: A lightweight air-cooling machine that fits into a wall. Cool air comes out one side, while hot exhaust comes out the other. Can be used to cool down rooms during summer, or to create a walk-in freezer. Does not break down.
LanguageData.PortableHeater.label: light alloy heater
LanguageData.PortableHeater.description: A lightweight device that converts electricity into heat. It can automatically turn itself on or off to reach a specific target temperature. Does not break down.
